content: in this legal case a court in grosseto has issued a final resolution regarding the testamentary succession of ag the court has declared mp as the universal heir of ag and has ordered the dissolution of the community inheritance formed by the deceased gs mp has been assigned exclusive ownership of a property and a motor vehicle while sg the heir of gs has been recognized as the rightful owner of postal passbooks and securities deposits the court has also declared the previous judicial seizure of a property as ineffective and has ordered mp to reimburse sg for the costs of the litigation various articles of the civil code have been applied by the court in making its decision the case had been ongoing for five years before the court issued its final ruling
